mType.description: Daemon management - Upload hex, iqrf or trcnfg file into TR transceiver.

msgId.description: Message identification for binding request with response.

raw.description: Returns array of objects req, see its description.

request.description: Binary buffer with request via IQRF interface.

status.description: Result of upload. 0 - upload successfull, 1 - general error, 2 - incorrect target memory, 3 - incorrect data length, 4 - incorrect memory address, 5 - target memory is write only, 6 - communication failure, 7 - operation is not supported by TR module, 8 - SPI bus is busy or TR module is not in programming mode

statusStr.description: IQRF GW daemon API (general or mType) status in string form.
